author: kdeleo
body:
#### PR description:

As suggested by @werdmann, the selection on the ndof had been added in the ```Primary4DVertexValidation```, furthermore we have fixed the filling of the number of vertices vs PU histograms, which was wrongly made on vertex and not on event basis.

#### PR validation:

The PR has been tested on workflow on TTbar14TeV+PU200 producing the expected effect
title: MTD Validation: add selection on vxt Ndof>4 in Primary4DVertexValidation
